WorkItem.Description:
PHP Fatal error:  Using $this when not in object context in /home/jsimpson/www/warp/library/PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 6159
Â 
Either the _ReadColor method should not be static (likely?) or line 6159 should have self::_version rather than $this->_version.
WorkItem.Summary: Using $this when not in object context

Comments.Message: Preferred option was passing $this->_version as an argument to static method _ReadColor. Calling a static method is faster than calling an instance method, and this change was implemented as part of the performance tuning for the Excel5 Reader
Thanks for taking the time to explain.  I can't wait to see what all these performance improvements are going to do for my app!  Thank you so much for all your hard work on this awesome project.
